sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnstsfdg ( STSFDG_NO , ntt_id , bbs_id , wrter_id , wrter_nm , password , stsfdg , stsfdg_cn , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updt_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updusr_id ) VALUES ( #stsfdgNo# , #nttId# , #bbsId# , #wrterId# , #wrterNm# , #password# , #stsfdg# , #stsfdgCn# , #useAt# , #frstRegistPnttm# , #lastUpdtPnttm# , #frstRegisterId# , #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnstsfdg SET stsfdg_no = #stsfdgNo# , ntt_id = #nttId# , bbs_id = #bbsId# , wrter_id = #wrterId# , wrter_nm = #wrterNm# , password = #password# , stsfdg = #stsfdg# , stsfdg_cn = #stsfdgCn# , use_at = #useAt# , frst_regist_pnttm = #frstRegistPnttm# , last_updt_pnttm = #lastUpdtPnttm# , frst_register_id = #frstRegisterId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE stsfdg_no = #stsfdgNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT stsfdg_no , ntt_id , bbs_id , wrter_id , wrter_nm , password , stsfdg , stsfdg_cn , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updt_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updusr_id FROM comtnstsfdg WHERE stsfdg_no = #stsfdgNo#

SELECT stsfdg_no , ntt_id , bbs_id , wrter_id , wrter_nm , password , stsfdg , stsfdg_cn , use_at , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updt_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updusr_id FROM comtnstsfdg WHERE 1=1
stsfdg_no = #searchKeyword#
ntt_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY stsfdg_no DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnstsfdg WHERE 1=1
stsfdg_no = #searchKeyword#
ntt_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
